attributes.action: Scrap political correctness in our daily lives, it is completely out of control, what is happening to Britain?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems that everything we do is governed by political correctness these days, why? Doesn't common sense prevail anymore? Christmas banned by some councils, school children not allowed to play tag in case then touch each other, snowball fights banned in case of injury. I enjoyed Christmas, played tag and love the snow, I'm still here, so wheres the harm? Scrap all this legislation, afterall, we all live here in this great country and it is ruining peoples lives.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
